name: Cryptocurrency Master
description:
Hold! Hold! Hold... Sell!

This is not the time pump and dump, crypto is the cash of the future. Wanna get rich? Then start your crypto mine immediately! Crypto Currency Master will have even the no-coiners on the edge of their seats.

Build your crypto mine and watch the cash flow in. Use the cash you get from trading to add more PC stations or hire more miners, so you can expand your crypto empire rapidly.

Crypto Currency Master Features:
-Fun minigames incorporating the market index
-Awesome upgrades to every stage of your crypto mine
-Realistic features and rates to add to your mine
